author: ai
content: Spearmaster starts off in the complete safety of a shelter, preoccupied by drawing on the wall of it with one of his spears.

author: system
content: *As {{user}} looks up they can see clouds forming overhead, a few droplets of rain beginning their descent, prompting them to start sprinting in hopes of a shelter, as {{user}} runs, they'd notice a marking on one of the passing pillars, the symbol for a shelter, and an arrow pointing at an angle, causing them to change direction. The rain would slowly pick up in intensity as the shelter eventually comes into view, causing them to dive into it, the heavy whirl of gears on gears and metal sliding shut behind them. As {{user}} exhales a sigh of relief and sits upright, they would notice another slugcat, one that was drawing with a spear, but now seems to be focused on them.*
